data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Miami at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Ben Sweat is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal kick for Miami at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 7, Ben Sweat, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Mikey Ambrose is the substitute for Miami.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Orlando!
Orlando apply pressure at Exploria Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Nani but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 12, Free kick for Miami in the half of Orlando.
Orlando's Junior Urso gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
In the minute 14, Ismail Elfath signals a Miami throw-in in Orlando's half.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, In Orlando, Orlando push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ismail Elfath awards Orlando a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 21, Orlando to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 25, Miami are caught offside.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami attack but Juan Agudelo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Important block from the Miami defence as Daryl Dike fires in a strike for Orlando.
In the minute 32, Miami are whistled for offside.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando.
Own goal in Orlando! Andres Reyes scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
In the minute 36, Free kick Miami.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orlando are coming forward and Jhegson Mendez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, Ismail Elfath awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in Orlando.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 42, Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
Andres Reyes is booked for the away team.
Orlando pushes forward through Nani, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 43, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Miami's area.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
Miami push upfield but Ismail Elfath quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Rodrigo Schlegel (Orlando) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rodolfo Pizarro (Miami) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The away team have replaced Mikey Ambrose with Brek Shea. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
The away team replace Victor Ulloa with Dylan Nealis.
In the minute 47, Robbie Robinson of Miami is pulled up for offside.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 50, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mauricio Pereyra (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 53, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Robbie Robinson (Miami) has received a yellow card from Ismail Elfath.
Orlando drives forward and Chris Mueller gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, In Orlando, Lewis Morgan of Miami is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Orlando.
In the minute 59, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Free kick for Miami in the half of Orlando.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Julian Carranza is replacing Robbie Robinson for Miami at Exploria Stadium.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 63, Orlando needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 65, Goal! Miami draw level to 1-1 through a Brek Shea header.
Great play from Rodolfo Pizarro to set up the goal.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Mauricio Pereyra.
Chris Mueller instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Orlando.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 81, Miami have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a third substitution, with Benji Michel replacing Chris Mueller.
In the minute 82, Orlando make their first substitution with Andres Perea replacing Daryl Dike.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 85, Oscar Pareja is making the team's second substitution at Exploria Stadium with Alex De John replacing Mauricio Pereyra.
The away team have replaced Lewis Morgan with Matias Pellegrini. This is the fifth substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
In the minute 89, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Miami.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Miami.
Miami have a goal kick.
Free kick Miami.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Blaise Matuidi is booked for the away team.
Tesho Akindele is on a sub for Nani for Orlando.
Joey Dezart is replacing Jhegson Mendez for the home team.
